divs: sighting detailsi was walking inside the military base heading to report for duty.suddenly something change in the air,everything got silent and by instinct i look straight above me.it was a black triangle with no lights,size about 60feet wide 40-45feet length.it was traveling very slow(10km\h 6-6.5m\h) at 30 feet above my head,i felt that i could reach out and touch it. place: k.e.e.m.(military base) c.town: sparta(greece) region: peloponnese mark: 36*57'35.19" n 22*29'41.64" e
